```{r, warning=FALSE,message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(caret)
```

```{r}
split_train<- read.csv("../Data/heavy/split_train.csv") %>%
  select(-1)
split_test<- read.csv("../Data/heavy/split_test.csv") %>%
  select(-1)
split_train$award<- ordered(as.factor(split_train$award))
split_test$award<- ordered(as.factor(split_test$award))
```

## Support Vector Machine (SVM)
```{r}
trctrl <- trainControl(method = "cv", number = 10)
model_svm <- train(award ~., data = split_train, method = "svmLinear",
trControl=trctrl, tuneLength = 10)
model_svm
predictions_svm<- predict(model_svm, split_test)
confusionMatrix(table(predictions_svm, split_test$award))
```
